content: *you really can make this pretty homespun afghan in 4½ hours -- we timed it lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # chs-4halfhourafghan skill level beginner level 1 homespun® article #790 2 colors 6 balls each 12 balls total *deco & shaker* crochet hook - size q-19 **15 75 mm** gauge 4 stitches and 3 row = 3 in with yarn doubled in pattern stitch pattern 1-row repeat afghan is worked with two strands held together throughout work in pattern for about 57 inches finish with crochet trim
